LanguageData.RPP_Production_Component.label: make robotic component
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Component.description: Produce Robotic Components which are used as logic circuits within a Robotic Matrix.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_Basic.label: make robotic matrix (basic)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_Basic.description: Produce a robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot with amateur-class skills (Tier 1).
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_Interm.label: make robotic matrix (intermediate)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_Interm.description: Produce a robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot with professional-class skills (Tier 2)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_Adv.label: make robotic matrix (Advanced)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_Adv.description: Produce a robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot with master-class skills (Tier 3).
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Cleaner.label: make cleaner bot
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Cleaner.description: Produce a unit capable of cleaning.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Hauler.label: make hauler bot
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Hauler.description: Produce a unit capable of hauling.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Builder_Basic.label: make builder bot (Tier 1)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Builder_Basic.description: Produce a unit capable of construction, deconstruction, mining, and repairing with amateur-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Builder_interm.label: make builder bot (Tier 2)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Builder_interm.descriptio: Produce a unit capable of construction, deconstruction, mining, and repairing with professional-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Builder_Adv.label: make builder bot (Tier 3)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Builder_Adv.description: Produce a unit capable of construction, deconstruction, mining, and repairing with master-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Crafter_Basic.label: make crafter bot (Tier 1)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Crafter_Basic.description: Produce a unit capable of crafting, smithing, and tailoring with amateur-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Crafter_interm.label: make crafter bot (Tier 2)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Crafter_interm.descriptio: Produce a unit capable of crafting, smithing, and tailoring with professional-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Crafter_Adv.label: make crafter bot (Tier 3)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Crafter_Adv.description: Produce a unit capable of crafting, smithing, and tailoring with master-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_ER_Basic.label: make ER bot (Tier 1)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_ER_Basic.description: Produce a unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires with amateur-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_ER_interm.label: make ER bot (Tier 2)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_ER_interm.description: Produce a unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires with professional-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_ER_Adv.label: make ER bot (Tier 3)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_ER_Adv.description: Produce a unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires with master-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Kitchen_Basic.label: make Kitchen bot (Tier 1)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Kitchen_Basic.description: Produce a unit capable of cooking and tending to plants with amateur-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Kitchen_intKitchenm.label: make Kitchen bot (Tier 2)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Kitchen_intKitchenm.descr: Produce a unit capable of cooking and tending to plants with professional-class ability.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Kitchen_Adv.label: make Kitchen bot (Tier 3)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Kitchen_Adv.description: Produce a unit capable of cooking and tending to plants with master-class ability.
